text: Roland Vogt (; 17 February 1941 â€“ 20 May 2018) was a German politician. He was the first member of the German Green Party to be elected to the Bundestag from Rhineland-Palatinate serving from 1983 to 1987. He was born in was born in Gelnhausen, Hesse-Nassau. Vogt died on 20 May 2018, aged 77. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians of Alliance '90/The Greens Category:Politicians from Rhineland-Palatinate
title: Roland Vogt
